description:
More storage right on your bars. Upgraded with next level weather protection, this double-ended roll top bag is waterproof and expandable. The Boa® attachment system is super secure, compatible with flat or drop bars. EVOC’s waterproof materials are hard wearing and protect your gear from precipitation and trail chunder.

  • 140/500-denier fabric with a PU coating is durable and weather-resistant
  • Roll-top design gives you adjustable volume and access from both ends
  • Boa® Fit System attaches to gravel, MTB or road bike handlebars
  • 1-way vent ports let air escape for easy compression, without letting the elements in
  • Welded seams and waterproof zippers
  • Adjustable elasticised cargo net is a great place to quickly stash a rain shell, arm warmers, or an almighty banana
name: EVOC Handlebar Pack Boa WP
